mapper.insert: insert into pdm_domestic_area_info (area_id, parent_area_id, area_name, area_level, area_geo) values (#{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaGeo,jdbcType=OTHER})
mapper.select: select area_id, parent_area_id, area_name, area_level, area_geo from pdm_domestic_area_info
